languages.text: Шрамы, полученные им в назначенном Инцендией Чорда покаянии, будто бы укрепили неуступчивый характер Иеронимуса, и, понеся наказание за свершенный грех, он с облегчением смог вынести приговор окружающим его кощунникам. Все меньше слов милосердия было в его речах и все больше гнева.
languages.translation_comment: Иеронимус не был скоррапчен, подвергся епитимье

languages.text: The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgressions, he could condemn those around him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.
languages.original_text: Шрамы, полученные им в назначенном Инцендией Чорда покаянии, будто бы укрепили неуступчивый характер Иеронимуса, и, понеся наказание за свершенный грех, он с облегчением смог вынести приговор окружающим его кощунникам. Все меньше слов милосердия было в его речах и все больше гнева.

traits.locale_text: The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Being punished for his sin, he could condemn the blasphemers that surrounded him with a relieved heart. He spoke less and less in words of mercy and more in words of wrath.

The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Being punished for his sin, he could condemn the blasphemers that surrounded him with a relieved heart. He spoke less and less in words of mercy and more in words of wrath.

The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgression, he could condemn those around surrounded him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgression, he could condemn those around surrounded him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgressions, he could condemn those around him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgressions, he could condemn those around him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

languages.text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达的审判在希罗尼穆斯身上留下了许多伤痕，而这似乎让他变得更加固执。由于他的罪过已经受到了惩罚，他得以更加心安理得地谴责他周围的人。他布道中的仁慈越来越少，而怒火却越来越多。
languages.original_text: The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgressions, he could condemn those around him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

traits.locale_text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达的审判在希罗尼穆斯身上留下了许多伤疤，而这似乎让他变得更加固执。由于他的罪过已经受到了惩罚，他得以更加心安理得地谴责他周围的人。他布道中的仁慈越来越少，而愤怒却越来越多。

languages.text: Die Wunden, die Hieronymus durch die von Incendia Chorda auferlegte Buße davontrug, schienen seinen sturen Charakter zu stärken. Nachdem er für seine Vergehen bestraft worden war, konnte er andere mit leichterem Herzen verdammen. Er sprach immer weniger von Gnade und immer mehr von Zorn.
languages.original_text: The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgressions, he could condemn those around him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

traits.locale_text: Die Wunden, die Hieronymus durch die von Incendia Chorda auferlegte Buße davontrug, schienen seinen sturen Charakter zu stärken. Nachdem er für seine Sünde bestraft worden war, konnte er andere mit leichterem Herzen verdammen. Er sprach immer weniger von Gnade und immer mehr von Zorn.

languages.text: Les cicatrices que Hiéronymus avait reçues pendant la pénitence imposée par Incendia Chorda ne firent que renforcer son obstination. Maintenant qu'il avait été puni pour ses transgressions, il pouvait condamner ceux qui l'entouraient plus aisément. La colère remplaçait de plus en plus la miséricorde dans ses sermons.
languages.original_text: The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgressions, he could condemn those around him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

traits.locale_text: Les cicatrices que Hiéronymus avait reçues pendant la pénitence imposée par Incendia Chorda ne firent que renforcer son obstination. Maintenant qu’il avait été puni pour sa transgression, il pouvait condamner ceux qui l'entouraient plus aisément. La colère remplaçait de plus en plus la miséricorde dans ses sermons.

languages.text: Las cicatrices que recibió Hieronymus como parte del arrepentimiento impuesto por Incendia Chorda parecieron reforzar su tozudez. Tras haber recibido castigo por sus propios delitos, se sintió libre de condenar a cuantos le rodeaban. Hablaba cada vez menos de la piedad y cada vez más de la ira.
languages.original_text: The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgressions, he could condemn those around him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

traits.locale_text: Las cicatrices que recibió Hieronymus como parte del arrepentimiento impuesto por Incendia Chorda parecieron reforzar su tozudez. Tras haber recibido castigo por su propia transgresión, se sintió libre de condenar a cuantos le rodeaban. Hablaba cada vez menos de la piedad y cada vez más de la ira.

languages.text: ヒエロニムスがインセンディア・チョーダから与えられた懺悔の傷は、彼の頑固な性格をより強固なものにしたようだ。罪の罰を受けたことで、彼は軽い気持ちで周囲の人々を非難することができるようになった。彼は慈悲を口にすることが少なくなり、怒りを口にすることがはるかに多くなった。
languages.original_text: The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgressions, he could condemn those around him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

traits.locale_text: ヒエロニムスがインセンディア・チョーダから与えられた懺悔の傷は、彼の頑固な性格をより強固なものにしたようだ。罪の罰を受けたことで、彼は軽い気持ちで周囲の人々を非難することができるようになった。彼は慈悲を口にすることが少なくなり、怒りを口にすることがはるかに多くなった。

languages.text: Tövbe ettiği sırada İncendia Chorda'nın verdiği yaralar, Hieronymus'un inatçı karakterini daha da güçlendirdi. Suçları nedeniyle cezalandırılmasının ardından çevresindekilere daha merhametten yoksun hükümler vermeye başladı. Merhametten daha az, gazaptan daha çok söz eder oldu.
languages.original_text: The scars that Hieronymus received in the repentance allotted to him by Incendia Chorda seemed to strengthen his stubborn character. Having been punished for his transgressions, he could condemn those around him with a lighter heart. He spoke less and less of mercy and more and more of wrath.

traits.locale_text: Tövbe ettiği sırada İncendia Chorda'dan aldığı yara izleri, Hieronymus'un inatçı karakterini daha da güçlendirmiş gibiydi. Suçları nedeniyle cezalandırılmasının ardından, çevresindekilere daha merhametsizce hükümler vermeye başladı. Merhametten giderek daha az, gazaptan ise giderek daha fazla söz ediyordu.

languages.translation_comment: Иеронимус не был скоррапчен, подвергся епитимье
